__e: I fought alongside him in the war with the French and, like a cancer, he brings with him only suffering and death.
I fought it when I was 16, and then again when I was 25.
You think I fought a war just so a mouthy little scum like you could call me a coward!
His life didn't stand for anything and then it was over.
He says you and him fought quite a war the last time out.
No, she wants to know why he fought in that war, why did he have to leave before she got to know him.
You're right. Those who fought the war for you bastards aren't heroes.
Now I'm going to give you the one man who not only speaks for that flag, but has fought for it with distinction and now represents it with honor.
Roger, I know it was awful And I know it'll never seem like it was that long ago, But you fought to make the world a safer place and you won
You took the fight to the enemy, and saved lives in the process.
You have made war against members of your own family... and mine!
Fought against your own kind! When you knew we'd stop at nothing.
Years ago, he fought with my father against the English.
Brother, we know you are not well, but battled honorably.
Can you tell us the name of the man you fought with at the crime scene?
I would consider it an honor to work with a man who's actually fought the War on Terror... who's lived among the enemy and understands 'em.
Tell me what happened after I fought the beast in the forest.
I fought the worst parts of myself for years, and I failed.
